name: Sheep Rescue
description:
Sheep Rescue puts the player in control of a sheep dog. Each day, he must gather the flocks of sheep and lead them to the sheepfold before sunset.

_____________________________________________________

Sheep Rescue is a game made for a game jam in my school on the theme `Granularity`. 

Be sure to plug in your controller before starting the game.

Use the left joystick to control the dog

Use the right joystick to direct the dog

Use the left trigger to make a "stop" bark

Use the right trigger to make a "repulsive" bark

The flock of sheep is always moving away from the dog and one sheep will run away at a time, bark at it to send it back into the flock.

A stray sheep will attract the wolves, bark at them to send them back into the forest

Take the flock to the sheepfold
